perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, telecommunication services are being provided between and among Europe,      and North America,  by means of submarine  cable and satellite  facilities;      and

WHEREAS, the Parties plan to supplement  such  facilities  with an optical fibre      submarine cable system called the TAT-14 Cable Network  (hereinafter called      "TAT-14") which will be used to provide telecommunication  services between      points in or reached via the United States of America,  the United Kingdom,      France, The Netherlands, Germany, Denmark and points beyond; and
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, telecommunication services are being provided between and among Europe,      and North America,  by means of submarine  cable and satellite  installations;      and

WHEREAS, the Participants plan to supplement  such  facilities  with an optical fibre      submarine cable system called the TAT-14 Cable Network  (hereinafter called      "TAT-14") which will be used to provide telecommunication  services between      points in or reached via the United States of America,  the United Kingdom,      France, The Netherlands, Germany, Denmark and points beyond; and
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'facilities' and 'installations' are used to describe similar concepts, but are not defined, creating ambiguity. The terms 'Parties' and 'Participants' may or may not refer to the same entity.

perturbation.original_text:
MAINTENANCE AUTHORITIES

      The Maintenance Authorities in TAT-14 shall be the Terminal Parties.

- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- September 2, 1998                                                         Page 3



MINIMUM INVESTMENT UNIT (MIU)

      One Ring-MIU
perturbation.changed_text:
MAINTENANCE AUTHORITIES

      The Maintenance Teams in TAT-14 shall be the Terminal Parties.

- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- September 2, 1998                                                         Page 3



MINIMUM INVESTMENT UNIT (MIU)

      One Ring-MIU
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Maintenance Authorities' is changed to 'Maintenance Teams'. It is now unclear if 'Authorities' and 'Teams' can be used interchangeably. The responsibilities of Maintenance Authorities are detailed later on, this name change creates uncertainty in their defined role and authority.

The term 'Purchasers' is changed to 'Consumers.' It is now ambiguous if a 'Consumer' of the services has the same obligations as a 'Purchaser' who is assigned capacity and any and all requisite licenses authorizing it to own, operate, acquire, sell and/or use,  as  appropriate,  the  capacity  in TAT-14 for the  provision  of international telecommunications.
